About

 Hello, I am Sumit Gupta. I work in Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Deep Learning. I am an alumni of IU Computer Vision Lab and Indiana University Bloomington where I received my masters in Computer Science under the guidance of Professor David Crandall. For an overview of my work, check out my projects. If you are interested in Computer Vision and Deep Learning research, then check my reading list and blog.
